change:
WorldGuessr just got a massive update.

### 📈 Performance Graphs
- Track your **ELO**, **XP**, and **ranks** over time with beautiful new graphs.
- See your growth, streaks, and slumps in a glance.

### 🔁 Ranked Duel Replays
- Every ranked match now has a **replay**.  
  - Spot patterns. Catch cheaters. Learn from legends.

### 🗺️ Map Maker Tools
- Added support for **panoIds** — more precise control for creators.

### 🙌 Shoutout
Huge thanks to the community (especially **Flykii**) for the feedback and ideas that made this update possible 💙

→ Play now: [worldguessr.com](https://worldguessr.com)
